name: Nemesis
description: Nemesis, goddess of vengeance and justice, rules over the balance of cause and effect, punishing arrogance and injustice.

skills.name: Air Rend
skills.description: Dashes towards the farthest enemy and deals DMG equal to 200% of ATK to enemies along the path. Gains a shield equal to 200% of ATK when the skill ends.

upgrades.level3: Defeating an enemy resets the skill's CD.

skills.name: Blade Waltz
skills.description: Targets the farthest enemy and dashes 4 times. Each dash prioritizes new targets, dealing DMG equal to 160% of ATK to enemies along the path. She is untargetable during the skill.

upgrades.level2: Hit enemies have their M-RER reduced by 10% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times.

skills.name: Duelist's Dance
skills.description: After dealing DMG 10 times, becomes empowered, gaining 30% increased ATK for 6s. This skill has a 12s CD.

upgrades.level2: Increases Dodge Rate by 50% for the duration.

skills.name: Fatal Thrusts
skills.description: Performs 4 consecutive thrusts in a rectangle, each dealing DMG equal to 80% of ATK.

upgrades.level3: Reduces healing received by hit enemies by 50%.
upgrades.level4: ATK bonus increases to 100%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Lightning Flash
relic.description: Increases Dodge Rate to 75% during Duelist's Dance.

upgrades.level3: Increases Dodge Rate to 100% during Duelist's Dance. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Performs 2 more Blinks during Ultimate. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
